name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - fentanyl immediate release
title: Fentanyl immediate release cost per 1000 patients
description: Cost of fentanyl immediate release per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: Fentanyl, in the form of tablets, lozenges, films and nasal spray, is an opioid analgesic used for breakthrough cancer pain.
There is little evidence it is more effective than oral morphine (such as oramorph) but it is much more expensive.
This indicator does not include fentanyl patches, which are not immediate release.
numerator_where:
bnf_code LIKE '0407020A0%AI' OR --Fentanyl_Loz 200mcg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0407020A0%AJ' OR --Fentanyl_Loz 400mcg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0407020A0%AK' OR --Fentanyl_Loz 600mcg (brands and generic)
